nodes.documentation:
@title Whitelist
@dev List of whitelisted users who can contribute.
nodes.name: Whitelist

nodes.documentation:
@dev Adds single address to admins.
@param _admin Address to be added to the admins
nodes.name: authorize

nodes.documentation:
@dev Removes single address from admins.
@param _admin Address to be removed from the admins
nodes.name: reject

nodes.documentation:
@dev Adds single address to whitelist.
@param _beneficiary Address to be added to the whitelist
nodes.name: addToWhitelist

nodes.documentation:
@dev Adds list of addresses to whitelist. Not overloaded due to limitations with truffle testing.
@param _beneficiaries Addresses to be added to the whitelist
nodes.name: addManyToWhitelist

nodes.documentation:
@dev Removes single address from whitelist.
@param _beneficiary Address to be removed to the whitelist
nodes.name: removeFromWhitelist

nodes.documentation:
@dev Tells whether the given address is whitelisted or not
@param _beneficiary Address to be checked
nodes.name: isWhitelisted
